name: Max Steel: Covert Missions
overview: Unreleased, found in the September 2020 leaks. Mattel's latest action hero lends perfectly to the Game Boy as he makes his gaming debut. Max must battle the evil forces of the D.R.E.A.D. organisation and rid the world of the terrorist threat. Max tackles his way through 11 rolling levels, battling such enemies as Vitriol, Psycho and Alecto Bane. Control Max in his MX25 Attack Jet, or help him infiltrate a secret hideout by swimming underwater. - Boss Levels - Fight numerous bosses throughout the game. - Strategic Missions - Complete secret covert missions from HQ. - Multiple Languages - Supports English, French, Spanish and German.
